    Enclosing class:
    MBoxParser

    public static class MBoxParser.MBoxMailFormat
extends org.apache.flink.api.common.io.DelimitedInputFormat<String>
    InputFormat that splits MBox files into strings of individual mails. Each mail becomes a String.
    See Also:
